name: The Mysterious Murasame Castle (Demo)
description:
For the past 8 months, I've been developing a Construct Adaptation of the Famicom Disk System Classic, The Mysterious Murasame Castle. I am presenting a brief demo for now as I need to focus on other things going forward. I will come back to this in due time, but for now, I hope you can enjoy this demo of what I've been able to cook up.

Controls: Arrow Keys to move, 'Z' for Katana Attack, and 'X' for secondary weapons.
